arts.ttl: Wolves vs Crystal Palace - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Premier League clash between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Crystal Palace, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Agbadou, Munetsi decision for Edwards: Predicted Wolves lineup vs. Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Wolverhampton Wanderers could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash with Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Will Guehi be fit to play? Predicted Crystal Palace lineup vs. Wolves
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Crystal Palace could line up for Saturday’s Premier League clash with Wolverhampton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Rob Edwards sets out three non-negotiables to the Wolves players ahead of Crystal Palace
arts.sum: He has now had time to link up with Rob Edwards, and Tchatchoua has shared what the new head coach has been asking for from his players, with Crystal Palace up next on Saturday. When a new head coach joins a club, there will be some different principles they set, and Jackson Tchatchoua has shared what Edwards wants his side to do.

arts.ttl: Paul Merson picks his winner in Wolves vs Crystal Palace as 'miracle' claim made
arts.sum: Saturday is a huge first test for Rob Edwards as Wolves head coach as Crystal Palace come to Molineux hoping to stave off any new manager bounce. While Crystal Palace do seem like a hard match, Paul Merson believes it is not the toughest in his preview of the game while simultaneously playing down Wolves’ chances.

arts.ttl: Wolves bidding to avoid ending 40-year streak in Edwards' first game versus Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers will be looking to avoid ending a 40-year streak when they square off against Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Premier League reschedules January fixtures for TV picks and UEFA clashes
arts.sum: Key January and February fixtures shift as Sky Sports and TNT Sports lock in broadcast slots, with Forest and Villa clashes moved due to European ties, per Premier League release.
